JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
ARI-Armaturen is a leading international developer, manufacturer and distributor of valves as well as complementary services linked to the control, isolation, safety and steam trapping of liquid and gaseous media.

Come and join the ARI-family!

Tasks
• Developing our business by Technical Support for the Sales Team and external partners in Denmark
• With the support of the engineering department from the German HQ: calculation of products and systems, selection and design of valves
• Customer Support on a technical and a commercial level
• Support in Sales Administration: preparation of quotes for our customers, support with national and international projects

Qualifications
• An engineering degree or technical background
• Ideally a proven sales experience
• Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
• Fluency in Danish, verbally and written, ideally also verbally in English and/or German

Why join ARI?
• Ongoing training, development, and support for a career in tech sales
• The opportunity to be a key presence at a rapidly expanding global company
• An exciting and motivating environment with international colleagues
• New building in Fredericia

Sådan ansøger du

If you are interested in joining our ARI-DK team, we are looking forward to receive your application documents stating your earliest possible starting date and salary expectations via E-Mail: nicolai.oestergaard@ari-armaturen.dk or on our website www.ari-armaturen.com/careers/.
